title: Sausage, cauliflower and fennel seed bread pudding
description: A stale loaf doesn’t have to mean dessert - savoury bread puddings can be just as delicious. Claire Thomson’s recipe proves just how versatile bread can be.
ingredients: few thyme stalks and 2 tsp thyme leaves
4 fat sausages or 6 smaller ones, meat removed from the skins
350g/12oz stale, sliced crusty white bread, with each slice cut into 3
half a head of radicchio, roughly sliced (optional)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
